channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty with Perfect Formula
channel.desc: Flaunt your fingers with Perfect Formula, offering luxury nailcare that looks gorgeous, whatever the occasion. Achieve a professional-looking, at-home mani with a little help from the experts.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Dannii Minogue Fashion
channel.desc: Discover fashion to flatter your shape with Dannii Minogue's beautiful range of on-trend styles, which offers a full spectrum of petite and regular sizes designed to help you find your perfect fit.
